arguments.file_text:
import time
import torch

# Micro-benchmark to compare out-of-place vs in-place scaling + add
# This approximates the changes made in DeepseekV2MoE forward paths

def bench_once(n_iter=500, device="cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu"):
    torch.manual_seed(0)
    x = torch.randn(4096, 8192, device=device)
    y = torch.randn_like(x)
    s = 2.5

    # warmup
    for _ in range(5):
        _ = x * s
        _ = x.clone().mul_(s)

    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t0 = time.time()
    for _ in range(n_iter):
        z = x * s
        z = z + y
    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t1 = time.time()

    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t2 = time.time()
    for _ in range(n_iter):
        z = x.clone()  # simulate result buffer from experts
        z.mul_(s)
        z.add_(y)
    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t3 = time.time()

    return (t1 - t0), (t3 - t2)


def main():
    t_out, t_in = bench_once()
    print({"out_of_place": t_out, "in_place": t_in, "speedup": t_out / t_in})


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    97	class DeepseekV2MLP(nn.Module):
    98	    def __init__(
    99	        self,
   100	        hidden_size: int,
   101	        intermediate_size: int,
   102	        hidden_act: str,
   103	        quant_config: Optional[QuantizationConfig] = None,
   104	        reduce_results: bool = True,
   105	        prefix: str = "",
   106	        tp_rank: Optional[int] = None,
   107	        tp_size: Optional[int] = None,
   108	    ) -> None:
   109	        super().__init__()
   110	        self.gate_up_proj = MergedColumnParallelLinear(
   111	            hidden_size,
   112	            [intermediate_size] * 2,
   113	            bias=False,
   114	            quant_config=quant_config,
   115	            prefix=add_prefix("gate_up_proj", prefix),
   116	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   117	            tp_size=tp_size,
   118	        )
   119	        self.down_proj = RowParallelLinear(
   120	            intermediate_size,
   121	            hidden_size,
   122	            bias=False,
   123	            quant_config=quant_config,
   124	            reduce_results=reduce_results,
   125	            prefix=add_prefix("down_proj", prefix),
   126	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   127	            tp_size=tp_size,
   128	        )
   129	        if hidden_act != "silu":
   130	            raise ValueError(
   131	                f"Unsupported activation: {hidden_act}. "
   132	                "Only silu is supported for now."
   133	            )
   134	        self.act_fn = SiluAndMul()
   135	
   136	    def forward(self, x):
   137	        gate_up, _ = self.gate_up_proj(x)
   138	        x = self.act_fn(gate_up)
   139	        x, _ = self.down_proj(x)
   140	        return x

   143	class MoEGate(nn.Module):
   144	    def __init__(
   145	        self,
   146	        config,
   147	        prefix: str = "",
   148	    ):
   149	        super().__init__()
   150	        self.weight = nn.Parameter(
   151	            torch.empty((config.n_routed_experts, config.hidden_size))
   152	        )
   153	        if config.topk_method == "noaux_tc":
   154	            self.e_score_correction_bias = nn.Parameter(
   155	                torch.empty((config.n_routed_experts))
   156	            )
   157	        else:
   158	            self.e_score_correction_bias = None
   159	
   160	    def forward(self, hidden_states):
   161	        logits = F.linear(hidden_states, self.weight, None)
   162	        return logits

   165	class DeepseekV2MoE(nn.Module):
   166	
   167	    def __init__(
   168	        self,
   169	        config: PretrainedConfig,
   170	        quant_config: Optional[QuantizationConfig] = None,
   171	        prefix: str = "",
   172	    ):
   173	        super().__init__()
   174	        self.tp_size = get_tensor_model_parallel_world_size()
   175	        self.routed_scaling_factor = config.routed_scaling_factor
   176	        self.n_shared_experts = config.n_shared_experts
   177	        self.n_share_experts_fusion = (
   178	            global_server_args_dict["n_share_experts_fusion"]
   179	            if global_server_args_dict["n_share_experts_fusion"] is not None
   180	            else 0
   181	        )
   182	
   183	        self.routed_scaling_factor = config.routed_scaling_factor
   184	        if self.tp_size > config.n_routed_experts:
   185	            raise ValueError(
   186	                f"Tensor parallel size {self.tp_size} is greater than "
   187	                f"the number of experts {config.n_routed_experts}."
   188	            )
   189	
   190	        if config.hidden_act != "silu":
   191	            raise ValueError(
   192	                f"Unsupported activation: {config.hidden_act}. "
   193	                "Only silu is supported for now."
   194	            )
   195	
   196	        self.gate = MoEGate(config=config, prefix=add_prefix("gate", prefix))
   197	
   198	        MoEImpl = (
   199	            DeepEPMoE
   200	            if global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]
   201	            else (EPMoE if global_server_args_dict["enable_ep_moe"] else FusedMoE)
   202	        )
   203	
   204	        self.experts = MoEImpl(
   205	            num_experts=config.n_routed_experts + self.n_share_experts_fusion,
   206	            top_k=config.num_experts_per_tok + min(self.n_share_experts_fusion, 1),
   207	            hidden_size=config.hidden_size,
   208	            intermediate_size=config.moe_intermediate_size,
   209	            renormalize=config.norm_topk_prob,
   210	            quant_config=quant_config,
   211	            use_grouped_topk=True,
   212	            num_expert_group=config.n_group,
   213	            topk_group=config.topk_group,
   214	            correction_bias=self.gate.e_score_correction_bias,
   215	            prefix=add_prefix("experts", prefix),
   216	            **(
   217	                dict(deepep_mode=DeepEPMode[global_server_args_dict["deepep_mode"]])
   218	                if global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]
   219	                else {}
   220	            ),
   221	        )
   222	
   223	        if config.n_shared_experts is not None and self.n_share_experts_fusion == 0:
   224	            intermediate_size = config.moe_intermediate_size * config.n_shared_experts
   225	            # disable tp for shared experts when enable deepep moe
   226	            if not global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]:
   227	                self.shared_experts = DeepseekV2MLP(
   228	                    hidden_size=config.hidden_size,
   229	                    intermediate_size=intermediate_size,
   230	                    hidden_act=config.hidden_act,
   231	                    quant_config=quant_config,
   232	                    reduce_results=False,
   233	                    prefix=add_prefix("shared_experts", prefix),
   234	                )
   235	            else:
   236	                self.shared_experts = DeepseekV2MLP(
   237	                    hidden_size=config.hidden_size,
   238	                    intermediate_size=intermediate_size,
   239	                    hidden_act=config.hidden_act,
   240	                    quant_config=quant_config,
   241	                    reduce_results=False,
   242	                    prefix=add_prefix("shared_experts", prefix),
   243	                    tp_rank=0,
   244	                    tp_size=1,
   245	                )
   246	
   247	        if global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]:
   248	            # TODO: we will support tp < ep in the future
   249	            self.ep_size = get_tensor_model_parallel_world_size()
   250	            self.num_experts = config.n_routed_experts
   251	            self.top_k = config.num_experts_per_tok
   252	            self.renormalize = config.norm_topk_prob
   253	            self.topk_group = config.topk_group
   254	            self.num_expert_group = config.n_group
   255	            self.correction_bias = (
   256	                self.gate.e_score_correction_bias.data
   257	                if self.gate.e_score_correction_bias is not None
   258	                else None
   259	            )
   260	
   261	            self.deepep_dispatcher = DeepEPDispatcher(
   262	                group=parallel_state.get_tp_group().device_group,
   263	                router_topk=self.top_k,
   264	                permute_fusion=True,
   265	                num_experts=config.n_routed_experts,
   266	                num_local_experts=config.n_routed_experts // self.tp_size,
   267	                hidden_size=config.hidden_size,
   268	                params_dtype=config.torch_dtype,
   269	                deepep_mode=DeepEPMode[global_server_args_dict["deepep_mode"]],
   270	                async_finish=True,  # TODO
   271	                return_recv_hook=True,
   272	            )
   273	
   274	    def forward(
   275	        self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor, forward_mode: Optional[ForwardMode] = None
   276	    ) -> torch.Tensor:
   277	        if not global_server_args_dict["enable_deepep_moe"]:
   278	            return self.forward_normal(hidden_states)
   279	        else:
   280	            return self.forward_deepep(hidden_states, forward_mode)
   281	
   282	    def forward_normal(self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
   283	        shared_output = self._forward_shared_experts(hidden_states)
   284	        # router_logits: (num_tokens, n_experts)
   285	        router_logits = self.gate(hidden_states)
   286	        final_hidden_states = (
   287	            self.experts(hidden_states=hidden_states, router_logits=router_logits)
   288	            * self.routed_scaling_factor
   289	        )
   290	        if shared_output is not None:
   291	            final_hidden_states = final_hidden_states + shared_output
   292	        if self.tp_size > 1:
   293	            final_hidden_states = tensor_model_parallel_all_reduce(final_hidden_states)
   294	        return final_hidden_states
   295	
   296	    def forward_deepep(
   297	        self, hidden_states: torch.Tensor, forward_mode: ForwardMode
   298	    ) -> torch.Tensor:
   299	        shared_output = None
   300	        topk_idx = torch.full(
   301	            (0, self.top_k), -1, dtype=torch.int, device=hidden_states.device
   302	        )
   303	        topk_weights = torch.empty(
   304	            (0, self.top_k), dtype=torch.float32, device=hidden_states.device
   305	        )
   306	        if (
   307	            forward_mode is not None
   308	            and not forward_mode.is_idle()
   309	            and hidden_states.shape[0] > 0
   310	        ):
   311	            # router_logits: (num_tokens, n_experts)
   312	            router_logits = self.gate(hidden_states)
   313	            shared_output = self._forward_shared_experts(hidden_states)
   314	            topk_weights, topk_idx = select_experts(
   315	                hidden_states=hidden_states,
   316	                router_logits=router_logits,
   317	                top_k=self.top_k,
   318	                use_grouped_topk=True,
   319	                renormalize=self.renormalize,
   320	                topk_group=self.topk_group,
   321	                num_expert_group=self.num_expert_group,
   322	                correction_bias=self.correction_bias,
   323	            )
   324	        if self.ep_size > 1:
   325	            # TODO(ch-wan): allow users to set num_max_dispatch_tokens_per_rank value
   326	            (
   327	                hidden_states,
   328	                topk_idx,
   329	                topk_weights,
   330	                reorder_topk_ids,
   331	                seg_indptr,
   332	                masked_m,
   333	                expected_m,
   334	            ) = self.deepep_dispatcher.dispatch(
   335	                hidden_states,
   336	                topk_idx,
   337	                topk_weights,
   338	                forward_mode=forward_mode,
   339	            )
   340	        final_hidden_states = (
   341	            self.experts(
   342	                hidden_states=hidden_states,
   343	                reorder_topk_ids=reorder_topk_ids,
   344	                seg_indptr=seg_indptr,
   345	                masked_m=masked_m,
   346	                expected_m=expected_m,
   347	                forward_mode=forward_mode,
   348	            )
   349	            * self.routed_scaling_factor
   350	        )
   351	        if self.ep_size > 1:
   352	            final_hidden_states = self.deepep_dispatcher.combine(
   353	                final_hidden_states,
   354	                topk_idx,
   355	                topk_weights,
   356	                forward_mode,
   357	            )
   358	        if shared_output is not None:
   359	            final_hidden_states = final_hidden_states + shared_output
   360	
   361	        return final_hidden_states
   362	
   363	    def _forward_shared_experts(self, hidden_states):
   364	        if self.n_shared_experts is not None and self.n_share_experts_fusion == 0:
   365	            return self.shared_experts(hidden_states)
   366	        else:
   367	            return None

   370	def yarn_get_mscale(scale: float = 1, mscale: float = 1) -> float:
   371	    import math
   372	
   373	    if scale <= 1:
   374	        return 1.0
   375	    return 0.1 * mscale * math.log(scale) + 1.0

    97	class DeepseekV2MLP(nn.Module):
    98	    def __init__(
    99	        self,
   100	        hidden_size: int,
   101	        intermediate_size: int,
   102	        hidden_act: str,
   103	        quant_config: Optional[QuantizationConfig] = None,
   104	        reduce_results: bool = True,
   105	        prefix: str = "",
   106	        tp_rank: Optional[int] = None,
   107	        tp_size: Optional[int] = None,
   108	    ) -> None:
   109	        super().__init__()
   110	        self.gate_up_proj = MergedColumnParallelLinear(
   111	            hidden_size,
   112	            [intermediate_size] * 2,
   113	            bias=False,
   114	            quant_config=quant_config,
   115	            prefix=add_prefix("gate_up_proj", prefix),
   116	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   117	            tp_size=tp_size,
   118	        )
   119	        self.down_proj = RowParallelLinear(
   120	            intermediate_size,
   121	            hidden_size,
   122	            bias=False,
   123	            quant_config=quant_config,
   124	            reduce_results=reduce_results,
   125	            prefix=add_prefix("down_proj", prefix),
   126	            tp_rank=tp_rank,
   127	            tp_size=tp_size,
   128	        )
   129	        if hidden_act != "silu":
   130	            raise ValueError(
   131	                f"Unsupported activation: {hidden_act}. "
   132	                "Only silu is supported for now."
   133	            )
   134	        self.act_fn = SiluAndMul()
   135	
   136	    def forward(self, x):
   137	        gate_up, _ = self.gate_up_proj(x)
   138	        x = self.act_fn(gate_up)
   139	        x, _ = self.down_proj(x)
   140	        return x

import time
import torch

# Micro-benchmark to compare out-of-place vs in-place scaling + add
# This approximates the changes made in DeepseekV2MoE forward paths

def bench_once(n_iter=500, device="cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu"):
    torch.manual_seed(0)
    x = torch.randn(4096, 8192, device=device)
    y = torch.randn_like(x)
    s = 2.5

    # warmup
    for _ in range(5):
        _ = x * s
        _ = x.clone().mul_(s)

    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t0 = time.time()
    for _ in range(n_iter):
        z = x * s
        z = z + y
    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t1 = time.time()

    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t2 = time.time()
    for _ in range(n_iter):
        z = x.clone()  # simulate result buffer from experts
        z.mul_(s)
        z.add_(y)
    if device == "cuda":
        torch.cuda.synchronize()
    t3 = time.time()

    return (t1 - t0), (t3 - t2)


def main():
    t_out, t_in = bench_once()
    print({"out_of_place": t_out, "in_place": t_in, "speedup": t_out / t_in})


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
